detailedDescription:
A fantastic spacious family home originally built as a three bedroom property with the added benefit of having no onward chain.
Internally this semi detached property boasts a wealth of features including an entrance porch, a great size through lounge, a fitted kitchen with custom fitted storage and a ground floor WC.
The first floor comprises of two spacious double bedrooms, as well as the family three piece bathroom suite.
Externally the property boasts good size rear garden which is partly paved and the rest is mainly laid to lawn and there is an outer building.
We do recommend a viewing (subject to government guideline) to fully appreciate what this property has to offer.
Within easy access to Dagenham Heathway Station, taking you into London Liverpool Street Station in 35 minutes.
Within close proximity to shopping facilities and amenities.

detailedDescription:
Brian Thomas Estate Agents are delighted to offer for sale this unique opportunity to purchase this beautifully presented extended five bedroom semi detached family house located close to high road shops, schools and within a short walking distance to Upney district line station with excellent links into London Fenchurch Street station. Features of this property include two reception rooms, fitted kitchen/diner, ground floor cloakroom/W.C., and off-street parking for at least 4 cars as well as an attached garage and potential for further extension. A viewing is highly advised.

Entrance hall: Hardwood entrance door, laminate flooring, under stairs cupboard.

Lounge: 14'6 x 13'2 (4.42m x 4.01m) Hardwood doubled glazed bay window to front elevation, fitted carpet, feature fire surround, electric points, double radiator.

Reception two: 17'4 x 14' (5.28m x 4.26m) Hardwood double glazed casement windows to front and side elevation, part laminated flooring and part fitted carpet, double radiator, electric points, TV and aerial points.

Passageway: Leading to utility area which houses plumbed washing machine and tumble dryer.

Ground floor cloakroom/W.C: Comprising of a low-level W.C, wash hand basin in vanity unit, heated towel rail, hardwood double glazed casement window to rear elevation, ceramic tiled floor and partly tiled walls.

Fitted kitchen & dining room: 19'8 x 13'6 (5.99m x 4.11m) This modern kitchen has been fitted with a range of fitted wall and floor units with integrated dishwasher, fridge and wine cooler. The granite worktop incorporates a breakfast bar, a single drainer sink with chrome mixer taps and a built-in gas hob and electric oven with extractor fan above. There is a ceramic tiled floor, part tiled walls, spot lit ceiling and a hardwood double glazed casement window to rear elevation.
Dining area: Hardwood double glazed French doors and windows to rear elevation, laminate flooring, electric points, double radiator with decorative cover, spot lit ceiling.

Stairs to first floor landing: Fitted carpet, dado rail, access to insulated loft.

Bedroom 1: 13'6 x 10' (4.11m x 3.04m) Fitted carpet, double radiator, hardwood double glazed casement window to rear elevation.
Ensuite showeroom/W.C: Comprising of shower cubicle, low level W.C., wash hand basin, extractor fan and partly tiled walls, double radiator.

Bedroom 2: 15'4 x 11'7 (4.67m x 3.53m) Fitted carpet, a range of fitted wardrobes with additional hanging cupboard space and matching bedside cabinets a dressing table, double radiator, electric points, hardwood double glazed bay window to front elevation.

Bedroom 3: 10'4 x 10'2 (3.15m x 3.1m) Fitted carpet, fitted wardrobes, fitted cupboard housing gas boiler and immersion heater, hardwood doubled glazed window to rear elevation.

Bedroom 4: 14'8 x 8' (4.47m x 2.44m) Laminate flooring, electric points, double radiator, hardwood doubled glazed window to front elevation.

Bedroom 5: 7'6 x 7'3 (2.28m x 2.2m) Fitted carpet, picture rail, electric points, hardwood doubled glazed bay window to front elevation.

Family bathroom: Half tiled walls, fitted carpet, raised spacious walk-in shower cubicle, raised paneled bath, low level W.C., pedestal wash hand basin, single radiator, hardwood double glazed windows to rear elevation.

Rear garden: (Approx. 50ft x 60ft) Laid to lawn, raised paved patio area, range of mature trees and shrubs.

Attached double garage: 17'9 x 12'8 Electric Up & Over doors, power and lighting, range of shelving and cupboards, window and door to rear elevation.

Front of property: Fully paved offering off street parking via dropped kerb for up to 4 cars.

Potential for further extension and development:

Viewings: By appointment with this office, weekdays until 6.30 pm and Saturday until 5 pm.

title: 2 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
Guide price £400,000 - £425,000

This well-proportioned three bedroom end of terrace house offers an abundance of features, not only is property chain free, it is located within an 10 minute walk to becontree district line station. Benefitting from a fitted kitchen, first floor shower room, two double bedrooms and a large single room plus the addition of an open plan lounge and detached garage.

To fully appreciate the accommodation on offer we strongly recommend to contact our sales team today and arrange your internal viewing before it’s too late!

When looking for a family home you will always find that you have two lists, whether compiled in writing or sitting within your mind. Those lists will comprise of your needs and desires and the team at Brookings are pleased to announce that this property offers it all!

Three bedrooms all of well-proportioned size, a detached garage, first floor shower room, two reception spaces and fitted kitchen.

Offering potential to extend further, (of course subject to planning permission) the house is perfectly positioned for families of all sizes.

With Becontree district line within a 10 minute walk, Parsloes Park a stone’s throw away, local education facilities ranging from birth to secondary school age all within catchment plus local bus routes on the doorstep, you will never feel isolated living in this home.

Offering all the expected features with a house i.e. Off street parking, double glazing and gas fired central heating plus the additional benefit of being chain free this property will not be on the market for long so book your internal viewing today!

title: 3 bed end terrace house for sale

detailedDescription:
* Guide Price £450,000 to £475,000*
A fantastic spacious family home, bright, airy and immaculately presented throughout, and with the added benefit on having no onward chain.
Internally this three bedroom semi detached property boasts a wealth of features including a lounge to front aspect, a separate utility room with a ground floor WC, a family room, and a beautiful ultra modern kitchen with high spec details and custom fitted storage.
The first floor comprises off two spacious double bedrooms both with fitted wardrobes, and a great size third bedroom, as well as the three piece modern family bathroom suite.
There is additional space with a loft room which has eaves storage, a skylight and is fully boarded.
Externally the property boasts a large rear garden which is mainly paved and partly laid to lawn, with plenty off space for outside entrainment, there is also an outer building.
To the front there is a driveway which has parking for two cars.
Ideally located for Dagenham Heathway Station and Dagenham Dock Station taking you into London Fenchurch Station in just 30 minutes, making this ideal for the London commuter. Within easy access to a variety of amenities and shopping facilities.
Viewings (subject to government guidelines)are highly recommended to appreciate all this property has to offer.

Trinity House is superbly placed for shopping, leisure and travel. Locally Vicarage Field, in the heart of Barking town centre, offers well over fifty shops in a modern setting with high street names and local independent stores.

Trinity House also has numerous primary and secondary schools nearby, and Barking park a 10 minute drive away.

Local stations provide an underground service for the District and Hammersmith and City lines, and nearby Barking runs the C2C overground service.

In addition to an Asda superstore in Barking, nearby Ilford offers a Sainsburys, plus the popular Exchange Mall, with its impressive food hall and more than a hundred shops, from M&S to Debenhams. Ilford is also where you will find two national health and fitness club chains.

The buyer will require a deposit to obtain a mortgage for this property.

To meet the requirements for this property we require as a guideline, a minimum household income of £33,334. If you are offered the property, your ability to afford this property will be assessed at your financial interview. Please note that applicants should purchase the maximum share that they can afford and sustain.

Only applicants who are registered with London and Quadrant will be eligible to be offered a property in one of our schemes. If you are not registered please visit our website and register to obtain your unique reference number.

Your home is at risk if you fail to keep up repayments on a mortgage, rent or other loan secured on it. Please make sure you can afford the repayments before you take out a mortgage.

These particulars are of opinion only, are intended to give a fair description and do not form the basis of a contract. The descriptions and all other information are believed to be correct as at June 2021.

detailedDescription:
Guide price £325,000 to £350,000
Must be Seen!
A beautifully presented two bedroom house, situated in a quiet road and within walking distance of both Goodmayes and Chadwell Heath stations. The location is just one of the wow factors about this home. Stylish interior throughout, this bright house comprises of a good size hallway which leads to two spacious reception rooms - currently used as separate dining room and living room. The lounge leads to one of the main selling features, the garden. Measuring approximately 100ft with a wooden deck and greenery it is a wonderful place for barbecues, children to play in and adults to entertain guests. A sleek integrated kitchen with modern fixtures and fittings is also part of the property. The first floor includes two spacious double bedrooms, one of which has a built in wardrobe offering ample storage space. It also has a contemporary bathroom. With off road parking for two cars. The property is also minutes from Green Lane which has a wide variety of local shops and round the corner from Goodmayes Park. Other benefits include double glazing, gas central heating (untested) and modern décor.

This is great starter home or buy to let investment!

A fantastic spacious semi detached family home, with the added benefit of having no onward chain.
Internally this three bedroom property boasts a wealth of features including a good-sized lounge to front aspect, a large fitted kitchen with custom fitted storage and a conservatory.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Kevin&Co are excited to offer this palatial easy maintenance home set on a corner providing you with ample breathing space and room to grow.

With room for at least three cars parking comfortably, there will be no need to worry again.

Likewise, once you are inside, you can relax in the solid safety of this house enclosing you in your own cocoon away from the stresses of the world. A sanctuary in the midst of the bustle, this house offers a vast lounge and kitchen with pristine decoration and floors. There is no need to do anything when you move except to become comfortable in your own space. The magnificent kitchen gleams at you as you enter with all the extra working surfaces crying out for your wondrous creations. Complemented with an adjacent dining area in the conservatory you can expand into the space and add further dimensions to your day just by being able to move around this elegant home.

Moving outside to the back area, there are distinct choices to be made as to whether you settle in to relax in the social bar area or carry on into the seclusion of your own garden room. There is a utility area for all the practical tasks of living like hanging out your washing. Overall the back offers many exciting nooks and crannies for you to make your own whilst at the same time keeping a sense of spaciousness that pervades the property. With the coming heatwave, you will feel the peace and coolness of your own outside haven. A handy gate encourages access between the front and the back which makes this property even more desirable.

Upstairs the rooms entice you in with light flooding through all the areas including the landing making them bright and welcoming. The floors are a breeze to keep clean and the upstairs positively glows with the bright neutral colours that enhance the generous bedrooms. Modern light fittings and panelled doors juxtapose to give a timeless experience of vastness. The clean streamlined bathroom continues the low maintenance practical yet spacious theme. You will be spoilt for choice in your leisure time with this easy maintenance home and garden.

There is a choice of Goodmayes Park recreation ground or Valence Park nearby as well as close connections to both the underground and National Rail. Shopping centres abound and schools are plentiful. The location of this home means there is plenty to see and do whilst exploring your local area after having rested in the haven of your beautiful home. Leave all the stresses behind as you nestle into this lovely property that is light and bright with future promise.

However, this home is really a property that should be viewed to be fully appreciated!

Auction closing date is Friday 2nd July 2021 at 12pm Please note that this property is for sale by the Modern Method of Auction which is not to be confused with Traditional auction. The Modern Method of Auction is a flexible buyer-friendly method of purchase. We do not require the buyer to exchange contracts immediately, but grant 28 days to achieve exchange of contracts from the date the buyer's solicitor is in receipt of the draft contracts and a further 28 days thereafter to complete. Allowing the additional time to exchange on the property means interested parties can proceed with traditional residential finance. Upon close of a successful auction or if the vendor accepts an offer during the auction, the buyer will be required to put down a non-refundable Reservation Fee of 3.6% (inclusive of VAT) subject to a minimum of £6,000 (inclusive of VAT) which secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. The buyer will be required to sign an Acknowledgment of Reservation form to confirm acceptance of terms prior to solicitors being instructed. Copies of the Reservation form and all terms and conditions can be found in the Legal Pack which can be downloaded for free from the auction section of our website or requested from our Auction Department.

Please note this property is subject to an undisclosed Reserve Price which is generally no more than 10% in excess of the Starting Bid. Both the Starting Bid and Reserve Price can be subject to change. Our primary duty of care is to the vendor. Terms and conditions apply to the Modern Method of Auction, which is operated by Douglas Allen powered by iam-sold Ltd.

The information provided about this property does not constitute or form part of an offer or contract, nor may be it be regarded as representations. Located on this popular development in Barking is this Two bedroom Second floor purpose built flat.

The property which is well maintained and recently decorated boasts of a large lounge/diner, fitted kitchen and bathroom two double bedrooms and the added benefit of allocated parking.

The location of the property is perfect for transport links and there are buses running from just around the corner that go to Barking station.

At Barking station you can catch a train on the District, Hammersmith and City and also C2C. Road links are excellent with the A406, A13 and M11 all only short rides away.

Close by the house there are some local convenience stores all within walking distance, slightly further away is Barking Town Centre where you can find all the big high street brands and the Vicarage fields shopping centre as well as Asda and Lidl, there is also Tesco and Sainsbury’s just along the A13 at Beckton and here you can also visit Galleons Reach retail park where again, all the big brand clothing and retail shops can be found.

When buying a family home schooling is obviously an important factor and there are both Primary and Secondary schools close by, mostly with good and excellent Ofsted ratings. This delightful home could soon be yours, so pick up the phone and call to book your viewing now!

This property won't hang around long, so call now to view before it's gone!

title: 2 bed terraced house for sale

address: Parklands Place, Barking Riverside, Barking IG11
detailedDescription:
Chamberlin Mansion - Apartment 44

2 bedroom fifth floor apartment with outdoor space. Contact a member of our sales team now to view our show home.

£83750 for a 25% share of £335000 and a deposit as low as £8375 and a minimum income of £46481.

Fielders Quarter at Barking Riverside
A landmark development for London along the banks of the River Thames. Barking Riverside is a joint venture between L&Q and The Mayor of London, and is one of Europe’s largest brownfield developments, covering an impressive 443 acres, alongside 2km of beautiful south-facing River Thames frontage. The master plan will deliver 10,800 new homes, the brand-new Barking Riverside Overground station, as well as commercial, retail and leisure facilities. This pioneering project will incorporate Envac, one of Europe’s largest automated waste disposal systems. New schools, parks and river walkways will all become home to an estimated 30,000 people at this former 1920s power station site. Fielders Quarter has a collection of Shared Ownership homes available at this award-winning development. Offering a variety of layouts and styles, each home will bring together a perfect blend of comfort, architecture and design.

A place to connect
Barking Riverside lies beside 2km of beautiful South-facing River Thames frontage, covering 443 acres which will eventually include 10,800 new homes of mixed size and style. There is also provision for 65,000 square metres of commercial floor space for shopping, restaurants, cafés, community and leisure facilities. The Parklands phase will feature open green spaces as well as an Ecology Centre due to open summer 2019.
London’s only district to adopt the nhs Healthy New Town initiative, Barking Riverside is set to incorporate a wide range of health measures, such as an on-site gp surgery, designed to help the residents to live longer, healthier, happier lives. A key element of the initiative is the network of cycle routes, located along the river and through every stage of the development.

Transport
Reach Fenchurch Street in 15 minutes
Reach Canary Wharf in 18 minutes
Reach Liverpool Street in 22 minutes
Reach Stratford in 21 minutes
Reach London Bridge in 30 minute

• Thames Clippers is extending its river bus RB1 route to Barking Riverside, with the new pier expected to open in the winter of 2021
• 4.5km extension to Barking Riverside, from the Tilbury Loop line between Barking and Dagenham Dock stations

Shared Ownership at Fielders Quarter
We know that buying a home in London - especially if you're a first time buyer - can often seem unachievable. Shared Ownership through L&Q at Fielders Quarter is a way to get on the ladder that’s more affordable than a traditional purchase.
You can buy a 25% - 75% share of your new home. You’ll then pay a mortgage on this and subsidised rent to us on the remaining share. Usually, you need a deposit of just 10% of the value of your share, meaning you can enjoy the stability of homeownership with a much lower upfront cost.
As time goes on and your income rises, you’ll have the option to staircase to increase the amount you own by buying extra shares. During your ownership, you can do this three times, with prices based on the market value of your home at the time, and some fees involved. Eventually, you can own 100% of your home, and no longer pay rent.
Eligibility criteria applies. You must have a maximum household income of £90,000. Please speak with our sales associates for more information.

Viewings
For those who would like to and are able to visit us, the Show Home is now open on an appointment-only basis, with extra measures in place to ensure your wellbeing. Please call us to book your appointment. If you would prefer to speak to our Sales Team from your own home, they are still on hand and can conduct appointments via phone, email and by virtual tour. *We are taking extra precautions to ensure the health and wellbeing of our customers, staff and members of the public.

address: Parklands Place, Barking Riverside, Barking IG11
detailedDescription:
Chamberlin Mansion - Apartment 4

1 bedroom apartment on floor -1 with outdoor space. Contact a member of our sales team now to view our show home.

£60625 for a 25% share of £242500 and a deposit as low as £6250 and a minimum income of £32501.

Fielders Quarter at Barking Riverside
A landmark development for London along the banks of the River Thames. Barking Riverside is a joint venture between L&Q and The Mayor of London, and is one of Europe’s largest brownfield developments, covering an impressive 443 acres, alongside 2km of beautiful south-facing River Thames frontage. The master plan will deliver 10,800 new homes, the brand-new Barking Riverside Overground station, as well as commercial, retail and leisure facilities. This pioneering project will incorporate Envac, one of Europe’s largest automated waste disposal systems. New schools, parks and river walkways will all become home to an estimated 30,000 people at this former 1920s power station site. Fielders Quarter has a collection of Shared Ownership homes available at this award-winning development. Offering a variety of layouts and styles, each home will bring together a perfect blend of comfort, architecture and design.

A place to connect
Barking Riverside lies beside 2km of beautiful South-facing River Thames frontage, covering 443 acres which will eventually include 10,800 new homes of mixed size and style. There is also provision for 65,000 square metres of commercial floor space for shopping, restaurants, cafés, community and leisure facilities. The Parklands phase will feature open green spaces as well as an Ecology Centre due to open summer 2019.
London’s only district to adopt the nhs Healthy New Town initiative, Barking Riverside is set to incorporate a wide range of health measures, such as an on-site gp surgery, designed to help the residents to live longer, healthier, happier lives. A key element of the initiative is the network of cycle routes, located along the river and through every stage of the development.

Transport
Reach Fenchurch Street in 15 minutes
Reach Canary Wharf in 18 minutes
Reach Liverpool Street in 22 minutes
Reach Stratford in 21 minutes
Reach London Bridge in 30 minute

• Thames Clippers is extending its river bus RB1 route to Barking Riverside, with the new pier expected to open in the winter of 2021
• 4.5km extension to Barking Riverside, from the Tilbury Loop line between Barking and Dagenham Dock stations

Shared Ownership at Fielders Quarter
We know that buying a home in London - especially if you're a first time buyer - can often seem unachievable. Shared Ownership through L&Q at Fielders Quarter is a way to get on the ladder that’s more affordable than a traditional purchase.
You can buy a 25% - 75% share of your new home. You’ll then pay a mortgage on this and subsidised rent to us on the remaining share. Usually, you need a deposit of just 10% of the value of your share, meaning you can enjoy the stability of homeownership with a much lower upfront cost.
As time goes on and your income rises, you’ll have the option to staircase to increase the amount you own by buying extra shares. During your ownership, you can do this three times, with prices based on the market value of your home at the time, and some fees involved. Eventually, you can own 100% of your home, and no longer pay rent.
Eligibility criteria applies. You must have a maximum household income of £90,000. Please speak with our sales associates for more information.

Viewings
For those who would like to and are able to visit us, the Show Home is now open on an appointment-only basis, with extra measures in place to ensure your wellbeing. Please call us to book your appointment. If you would prefer to speak to our Sales Team from your own home, they are still on hand and can conduct appointments via phone, email and by virtual tour. *We are taking extra precautions to ensure the health and wellbeing of our customers, staff and members of the public.

detailedDescription:
Abbey Quay - New apartments are now available - book your exclusive viewing of the new show home today!

This spacious three bedroom apartment features contemporary interiors with Weston Homes’ high standard of design and specification.

Our new homes feature stylish open-plan living areas, fully-equipped kitchens with integrated appliances and quartz stone worktops, while the luxury bathrooms include the latest Smart technology and vanity units with built-in storage. Enjoy hyperfast 1Gbps broadband and relax on the beautifully landscaped riverside gardens.

Main bedrooms come with fitted wardrobes and flooring is included throughout. You can also choose from a range of designer options to tailor your home just for you*.

About Abbey Quay

Abbey Quay is an exciting new landmark address fronting directly onto the River Roding, providing luxury homes within a thriving waterfront urban village in the London Borough of Barking & Dagenham.

As well as over 1,000 new 1,2 & 3 bedroom apartments, this incredible 6 acre scheme will include a riverside plaza and walking routes along the River Roding, commercial space & leisure venues, an on-site community facility and a state-of-the-art gymnasium.

Don’t miss out on these exciting new homes - get in touch with us today!

*Choices from developer’s range and subject to stage of construction. Specifications are subject to change.

Recessed porch with wooden entrance door to:

Entrance hall: Double glazed leaded window to front. Papered walls with dado rail and wooden panelling below. Carpeted stairs to first floor with spindled balustrade and built-in storage under the stairs housing meters etc. Coving, radiator, and doors to:

Kitchen: 8’ X 7’4: Single glazed leaded window to rear and part glazed door to rear garden. Range of base and eye level units with worktop over. Built-in electric oven/grill with five burner gas hob and extractor fan over. Integrated dishwasher, plumbing for washing machine, one and half bowl sink unit with mixer tap and wall mounted boiler. Painted papered walls with tiled splashbacks, laminated flooring and power points.

First floor landing: Papered walls with dado rail and wooden panelling below. Spindled balustrade, built-in storage cupboard, loft hatch and doors to:

Bedroom one: 15’6 (into bay) X 10’11 (to rear of wardrobes): Double glazed leaded bay window to front. Fitted wardrobes, papered walls, carpeted flooring, radiator, coving and power points.

Bedroom two: 12’ X 10’6 (to rear of wardrobes): Double glazed leaded window to rear. Papered walls, carpeted flooring, fitted wardrobes, radiator, coving and power points.

Bedroom three: 8’2 X 7’4 (to rear of wardrobes): Double glazed leaded window to front. Papered walls, carpeted flooring, mirrored sliding door wardrobes, radiator, coving and power points.

Family bathroom: Double glazed obscured glass window to rear. Panelled bath with shower mixer tap, WC and wash hand basin. Tiled walls, laminated flooring, chrome radiator and extractor fan.

Exterior:

front garden: Paved path to entrance door with established front garden.

Rear garden: Measures approximately 50’. Has paved patio with step up to lawned area with established shrubs and trees to sides and rear of garden and brick built shed.

address: Mayes View, Meadow Road, Barking IG11
detailedDescription:
Mayes View offers a contemporary collection of 1 and 2 bed apartments available through Shared Ownership. Book your viewing now!

Description

Mayes View offers a contemporary collection of 1 and 2 bedroom apartments available through Shared Ownership, built using quality materials to last with versatile interiors and private outdoor space to each home. Residents can also benefit from landscaped open spaces, a play area and a community room.

Please note that there is a 6 week priority period for buyers that live or work in Barking & Dagenham. The priority period ends on the 15th of July.

The area

Mayes View is surrounded by blissful open space, while close to all the amenities you could need. Taking its name from the nearby Mayesbrook Park, residents of Mayes View can reach five other parks located only 10 minutes cycle away, including Greatfields Park and Barking Park.

For sports lovers, Abbey Leisure Centre offers a swimming pool, spa, gym and group activities. Alternatively, there is a choice of entertainment nearby, including a bowling alley, cinema and a theatre.

Your Journey*

Upney underground station is located just 5-minute walk from Mayes View, providing access to District line and Hammersmith & City lines. The location opens up the entire city, putting everything within easy reach.

• 15 mins to Stratford
• 16 mins to Fenchurch Street
• 23 mins to Liverpool Street
• 25 mins to Bank

*Travel times are taken from Google Maps & tfl and are dependent on the time of the day

Square Footage: 763 sq ft

Leasehold with approximately 125 years remaining

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Guide price £575,000 to £600,000

A rare and unique opportunity to acquire this early 2016 build freehold 4 bedroom end of terrace house situated on a quite residential cul-de-sac turning located a stone's throw away from Upney Underground Station. Benefitting with further scope to extend subject to planning and 4.5 years NHBC remaining.

The accommodation is accessed via the front door leading into the wide hallway. To the front is a bespoke fitted kitchen fitted with integrated appliances along with a Harvey's water softener fitted under the sink. A ground floor cloakroom is located under the stairs. And to the rear is a bright and spacious reception with further space for dining. Double glazed doors leading onto the private rear garden.

Stairs to the first floor landing provide you with two large double bedrooms with the main bedroom located to the rear fitted with an en-suite shower room. Stairs to the second floor landing provide you with two further large double bedroom along with a family bathroom suite also fitted with an additional shower. The second floor also has access to a loft space providing ample additional storage space.

Being a new build property this house of course benefits with gas central heating, double glazed windows and allocated parking.

A special feature include the property also having solar panels providing free electricity when the sun is shining. Furthermore, a professionally installed alarm system has also been fitted which can be controlled via a mobile phone.

Location

The location is very unique - situated just off Upney Lane and parallel to Longbridge which connects into the heart of Barking Upney Underground Station is a couple minutes walk away, providing easy access into Central London (25min to Canary Wharf and 35min to Liverpool St by tube) via the District, Circle and Hammersmith & City lines. Buses and local transport links are on your doorstep and for those who commute via car the A13, A406 and M11 roads are also nearby. The A13 is a minutes drive away providing easy access into Thurrock and Lakeside. Furthermore, 'Good' rated schools, parks & multiple retail parks are also situated locally, making this property ideal for both residential and investment buyers.

Book in a viewing today to avoid missing out!

Agents note - Yopa inspected this property and will be pleased to provide any additional information as may be required. The information contained within these particulars should not be relied upon as statements or a representation of fact and photographs are for guidance purposes only. Services and appliances have not been tested and their condition will need to be verified. All guarantees need to be verifies by the respective solicitors.

EPC band: B

title: 3 bed end terrace house for sale

detailedDescription:
Rentigo are pleased to offer this fantastic opportunity to acquire this 3 bedroom 1 reception mid-terraced house located in a quite cul-de-sac residential location.

Virtual Tour:

The accommodation is accessed into the hallway then leading to the ground floor you have a large reception with heated conservatory with dining space, a decent kitchen to right and a ground floor cloakroom. To the first floor you have a good sized landing with the master bedroom to the front along with a double sized rooms to the rear. The family bathroom is also situated on the first floor. The second floor has a third room with en suite.

The good size rear garden and boast plenty of sunlight. The property also benefits with gas central heating, double glazed windows.

The front of the property has a beautifully presented front garden.

Location

The location is very unique - Situated in the Barking Riverside Estate, the A13, A406 and the M11 roads are within comfortable distance. There is a large amount of development taking place near by with new train lines and retail parks being open very soon. Local bus services are within walking distance providing easy access towards Barking & Ilford Town centres. Barking and Upney Stations are also within comfortable distance. Available for Sale is this beautiful fully renovated three bedroom end of terraced house located opposite Eastbury Community School an Ofsted 'Good' comprehensive with an 'Outstanding' sixth form.

This property is a spacious family home has been renovated to a fantastic standard throughout recently. Situated in the Faircross estate and only around 6 minutes walk to Barking underground station (District Line; C2C; London Overground services).

Comprising of three spacious bedrooms, a large reconfigured family bathroom, porch, hallway, reception room, open plan 19 ft kitchen/ diner and WC to the ground floor. Additional benefits include fully renovated incl. Plastering (skimming) throughout, flooring, carpets, some new windows (property fully double glazed), new door frames, skirting boards, fire doors, new bigger bathroom and suite, new kitchen and white goods (incl. Dishwasher), updated plumbing and electrics (new rcbo box with provisions to accommodate future loft conversion/extensions), new guttering and down pipes (front and rear of property), PVC soffits and Fascias (no need for painting ever again), and a new porch door at the entrance. All upgrades are Building Control, fensa, Gas Safe and EIC certified [certificates available]. Externally there is a low maintenance 18m (60 ft) south-facing rear garden with perennial plants and 5m wooden deck and also two wooden and one metal sheds, all in full working order. The front garden can be converted to a driveway (STPP).

This property has just been rented out for the first time for about a year at £1750 pm (contract ends early Aug 2021), The tenants were fully referenced and have been paying their rent on time (they can continue if new owner wishes to).

The house offers huge potential for a new owner to extend the property into a 6 bedroom house with an additional reception STPP.

title: 4 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
A fantastic opportunity to acquire this 4 bedroom end of terrace house located in a quiet residential turning. Finished to a high standard and fitted with quality materials throughout! Some benefits include off street parking for a minimum of 4 cars along with a fantastic and beautifully finished private rear garden with an fully equipped outbuilding.

The accommodation is accessed via the front door leading into a spacious hallway. On the ground floor you have a private reception to the front. To the rear is every lady's dream kitchen with ample of space for entertaining guest and dining. By folding doors to the rear lead onto a beautiful rear garden. To the side is an extra utility room and a handy ground floor shower room.

Stairs to the first floor landing provide you with 4 double sized bedrooms and a family bathroom suite. The property also has a habitable loft space accessed via a drop down ladder.

A special key feature includes the property having a large outbuilding to the rear fitted with electrics which can be accessed via the side of the property. The property further benefits with having off street parking for up to 4 cars gas central heating and double glazed windows.

The front of the property has been paved with bricks and the larger than average rear garden has been partly decked and mainly laid to lawn with concrete slabs fitted to make a pathway to the outbuilding.

Location

The location is very unique - Situated just of Bastable Avenue in the Barking Riverside Estate, the A13, A406 and the M11 roads are within comfortable distance. There is a large amount of development taking place nearby with new train lines and retail parks being open very soon. Local bus services are within walking distance providing easy access towards Barking & Ilford Town centres. Barking and Upney Stations are also within comfortable distance. The area is full of parks, green spaces and local amenities just round the corner making it an ideal property for those with kids, first time buyers or an investor.

Book in a viewing today to avoid missing out!

This beautifully presented, extended four bedroom family family home boasts a wealth of features to include an entrance hall, a spacious lounge to front aspect, a second reception area leading into an open plan kitchen/dinning area with integrated appliances.

The first floor present's three bedrooms two of which have built in wardrobes and the family bathroom.

The second floor offers a landing leading into the fourth bedroom and a further bathroom.

Externally there is a great size drive way for off street parking, a private rear garden with a detached garage.

Fantastic location, situated within close proximity to Upney Station taking you into central London in just 25 minutes making this ideal for the London commuter.

We do genuinely recommend a viewing (subject to government guidance) to fully appreciate the standard of finish which in our opinion is exceptional.

detailedDescription:
Register with Pocket Living via our website to book a viewing!
Award-winning developer Pocket Living's latest scheme: Harbard Close IG11. Offering 78 one bedroom affordable Pocket homes for London’s city makers, all with access to an indoor Garden Room where residents can work, exercise & relax. Harbard Close IG11 will also include access to landscaped gardens, allotment spaces and a ping pong table. Register with Pocket Living now to book a virtual viewing.

Own 100% of your property for 20% less!

Pocket homes are discounted by at least 20% to the local market, allowing Pocket owners to own 100% of their home at a discounted price.

Harbard Close IG11 is conveniently located just a short walk from Barking town centre and Barking station, benefitting from great transport links into central London using the overground, the c2c and the underground network.

Barking has numerous green parks in and around the Borough, with Barking Abbey Grounds just a few minutes' walk from Harbard Close IG11. Barking Park is just a 13 minute walk away and includes a splash park that's open in the summer, some sports courts and a waterside café.

You may be eligible for this property if:

- You live or work in London
- You have a household income of no more than £90,000
- You are a first time buyer

Two wheelchair accessible Pocket homes are available for those who require the use of mobility aids.

Priority will also be available for key workers who meet the above eligibility criteria.

Harbard Close IG11 is a car free development.

Internal images of Show Home. CGI's are indicative and for illustrative purposes only.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
This property is offered for sale using the Committed Buyer process. When an offer is accepted, the buyer will be required to pay a non-refundable Buyer’s Premium of £6,600 including VAT (in addition to the final negotiated selling price), sign the Reservation Form and agree the Terms and Conditions prior to solicitors being instructed. If you require a copy of these documents, or for further information, please contact the Committed Buyer team on . This will secure the transaction and the property will be taken off the market.

Being sold using the Committed Buyer process.

Committed Buyer is a new, innovative and pioneering process for buying and selling property. It significantly reduces the risk of gazumping or double-selling by offering security to both parties by gaining a commitment from both parties to buy and sell as agreed.

A fantastic opportunity to acquire this spacious, bright and airy one bedroom purpose built fifth floor flat with 136 years lease left remaining.

The accommodation is accessed via a secure entry phone system with stairs or a lift to the fifth floor landing in through your own private door leading into the hallway. As you walk into the hallway which provides access to all the rooms in the property, you have a good sized double bedroom with ample of wardrobe space. A newly fitted and well kept 3 piece bathroom suite. To the side you have a lengthy and bright open plan kitchen and reception which leads onto a balcony.

A special key feature includes the property being refurbished and also has an EWS1 form available upon request.

Lease equates to 136 years.

Service Charge equates to circa £3,270 pa

Ground Rent equates to £200 pa

Rental estimate for Buy to Let investors is approximately £1000 to £1200 per calendar month.

Location

The location is perfect - Situated just off Ripple Road which leads on to the heart of Barking Town Centre and Barking Station Parade, in this unique location, Barking Underground Station is within a 5 minutes walk away providing easy access in to Central London via the District, Hammersmith & City and Circle Lines. Local amenities and supermarkets can be found at the top of the road in Barking Town Centre as well as buses taking you into several different locations. The A406, A13 and M11 Roads are within comfortable distance for those that commute via car. Furthermore, local schools and parks are also situated locally making this property ideal for both residential and investment buyers.

Book in a viewing today to avoid missing out!

Agents note - Yopa inspected this property and will be pleased to provide any additional information as may be required. The information contained within these particulars should not be relied upon as statements or a representation of fact and photographs are for guidance purposes only. Services and appliances have not been tested and their condition will need to be verified. All guarantees need to be verified by the respective solicitors.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Quatremain & Co - The Estate Agent are pleased to introduce this well presented 1 bedroom garden flat to the market for sale.

Situated in a quiet cul-de-sac location and benefitting from off street parking this property is an ideal buy to let opportunity.

Located on the ground floor of this converted house the property is accessed via a communal hallway shared with only one neighbour. The front door opens into a small entrance hall that leads into the kitchen/living/dining room and from there you have access to the remaining living accommodation that comprises a double bedroom, and a fully tiled 5 piece bathroom that measures over 6 meters in length!

The property is ideal for the commuter with Dagenham East Station only 0.6 miles away (walking) and further benefitting from the outdoor spaces of Old Dagenham Park & The Leys which are literally a 4-5 minute walk away.

This property is a bisf steel frame construction - not concrete ie Wimpey/Laing type

bisf houses are often confused with other prefabricated houses built in the same post-war era. This can cause problems because many of the other types of prefabricated housing are listed as Defective Housing and potential buyers can not obtain mortgages. Bisf houses however have never been listed as defective and continue to be mortgageable.

It has not been prc repaired

detailedDescription:
Please be aware this is a Sale by Tender property and the prospective purchaser will incur an introductory fee to Aston Fox.

At each individual viewing, we will supply ppe equipment.

Truly stunning executive family living!

Don’t hesitate and call today to view this delightful Four bedroom mid terraced family town house ideally located on this quiet development in Barking’s ever popular Great Fleet Estate.

The property which is bright, modern and beautifully presented throughout and boasts of a spacious lounge, fitted kitchen/diner, ground floor cloakroom/W/C. Rising to the first floor there are two bedrooms, one of which has an en suite bathroom and there is also the Family bathroom rising to the second floor there are Two further double bedrooms and a stunning family bathroom.

Externally the property has a stunning garden which is beautiful in the summer months and ideal for barbecues, there are also two verandas that are on the first and second floors of the house. There is an allocated parking bay to the front of the house.

The Location of the property is perfect for transport links and there are buses running from just around the corner that go to Barking station.

At Barking station you can catch a train on the District, Hammersmith and City and also C2C. Road links are excellent with the A406, A13 and M11 all only short rides away.Close by the house there are some local convenience stores all within walking distance, slightly further away is Barking Town Centre where you can find all the big high street brands and the Vicarage fields shopping centre as well as Asda and Lidl, there is also Tesco and Sainsbury’s just along the A13 at Beckton and here you can also visit Galleons Reach retail park where again, all the big brand clothing and retail shops can be found.

When buying a family home schooling is obviously an important factor and there are both Primary and Secondary schools close by, mostly with good and excellent Ofsted ratings.This delightful home could soon be yours, so pick up the phone and call to book your viewing now!

title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
Real Move Estates are pleased to offer this well presented & extended four bedroom family home for sale in Dagenham, RM10 within easy access to both Dagenham Heathway & Dagenham East Station (District Line).

As you walk through the front door the hallway leads you into the front facing living room with a fireplace feature creating a cosy environment. The living area leads you to the utility room with ample storage space & a ground floor family bathroom with a separate shower cubicle. At the rear of the living room the double doors lead you to the fitted kitchen area with dining space and double doors leading you to the rear garden. The first floor offers a W/C, two generous sized double bedrooms, one single bedroom and the forth bedroom currently being used as a walk in wardrobe. With potential to have extra bedrooms in the loft (STPP) there is still options to make this property larger.

This property has double glazed windows & gas central heating throughout with the added advantage of a side access leading you directly to the low maintenance garden & a driveway where you can easily fit 2 cars. Located within easy reach to the Heathway where you have Dagenham Heathway Station (District Line), a range of different shops and the local area offering schools for all different ages.

*Potential to acquire land next to the property through the local council*

An internal inspection is highly recommended. To arrange a viewing please call Real Move Estates.

detailedDescription:
Ekko London are more than pleased to be offering a delightful two - bedroom flat set in the culturally diverse London borough of Barking & Dagenham; this flat conveniently set on the ground floor of this building. This flat boasts its own private garden, which sets you apart from other flat owners in the area or even in that building, bringing a wonderful play space for children or a relaxing area for adults.

In addition to this; it is helpfully situated very close to Zone 4 Train Stations - Barking & Upney Station meaning that living in this flat will provide you a direct link to anywhere in the city of London. The borough also benefits from amazing secondary and primary schools, excellent nurseries or day-cares and high quality leisure centres in the area. Through the use of tfl, you can also travel to Greater London; areas such as Thurrock or Essex are easily accessible with one bus or the fast C2C train, available at Barking Station, which really does widen your horizon of opportunities.

More locally, the area does have many shops and amenities, offers local parking and a small playground for young children to entertain themselves. This flat in Barking has two double bedrooms, meaning that it is very spacious granting owners & tenants, freedom to arrange the rooms in however they see fit.
The flat is fitted with Gas Central Heating, includes a large reception room or lounge with access to the garden and a lovely fitted kitchen, resulting in a wonderful living space for anyone that grabs this opportunity.

Reception Room / Lounge = 18' by 9'1 or 5.49m x 3m

Kitchen = 3.12m x 3.1m or 10'3 by 10'2

Master Bedroom = 13'6 by 9'11 or 4.11m x 3.02m

Second Bedroom = 13'4 by 8'11 or 4.06m x 2.72m

Total Square Feet / Metres = 764" or 70m2

Family home!

Due to the build of the property (precast concrete ) there is only 1 lender who will lend on the house and cash buyers are welcome. All prospective purchases will have to speak to Aston Fox's Mortgage adviser to ascertain that the credit criteria is met of the lender.

Located just off Bastable Avenue is this three bedroom mid terraced family home. The property which has been fully refurbished to a high standard and is offered chain free boasts of a spacious lounge, modern fitted kitchen, ground floor W/C, and spacious rear garden.

To the first floor there are three well sized bedrooms and modern family bathroom.

The location is excellent and local amenities are only a short walk away and there are two supermarkets only a 5-10 minute drive away.

Transport links are also good by road and bus as the A13, A406 and M11 are all only short drives away. There will soon be a station built which will be within walking distance and allow access to Barking Station and other lines. Schools are close by and this property is ideal for a first time buyer or investor.

detailedDescription:
A fantastic family home, bright and airy and immaculately presented to a high spec throughout.
With the added potential of having no onward chain.
Internally this three bedroom semi detached property boasts a wealth of features including a great size through lounge leading into the newly modern fitted kitchen which comes with custom fitted storage, and high spec details, a utility area and a ground floor WC.
The first floor comprises of two spacious double bedrooms, a third single bedroom and the three piece family bathroom suite.
Externally the property boasts a large outer building, a well maintained rear garden which is entirely paved as well as a front paved area.
Viewings are recommended ( subject to government guidelines ) to fully appreciate what this property has to offer.
Within easy access to Dagenham Heathway Station, taking you into London Fenchurch Street Station in 30 minutes.

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

Some or all information pertaining to this property may have been provided solely by the vendor, and although we always make every effort to verify the information provided to us, we strongly advise you to make further enquiries before continuing.

If you book a viewing or make an offer on a property that has had its valuation conducted virtually, you are doing so under the knowledge that this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and that we may not have been able to access the premises to confirm the information or test any equipment. We therefore strongly advise you to make further enquiries before completing your purchase of the property to ensure you are happy with all the information provided.

detailedDescription:
Summary

This will be a fabulous house for a first time buyer(s) and would also suit any buy-to-let investor(s) looking to either add to an existing portfolio or to start a new investment. The house will be easy to let and this great family home is ready to go! Situated in a quiet residential location within walking distance to amenities, including supermarket, leisure centre with pool. Fantastic transport links with District Line trains directly into London and within walking distance for buses to Romford, Barking, Ilford and other surrounding areas. For your children's education, 3 primary schools and 3 secondary schools are within walking distance. Central park is also within walking distance. Fairly neutral throughout all you need to do is pick your colour. The lounge is a good size and gives access to a dining room. The kitchen leads on to the lounge. All five bedrooms are good sizes . The bathroom has the potential to provide a tranquil and relaxing environment.

Entrance Porch

Entrance via obscure double glazed door, tiled flooring.

Hallway (2.8m x 2.5m)

Coving to ceiling, storage cupboard, laminate flooring, radiator, serving hatch to dining room.

Lounge (5.0m x 3.3m)

Double glazed sliding doors to garden, coving to ceiling, radiator, laminate flooring, serving hatch from kitchen, archway to dining room.

Dining Room (4.0m x 2.5m)

Double glazed window to rear, coving to ceiling, radiator, laminate flooring.

Kitchen (3.2m x 2.5m)

Double glazed window to front, suspended ceiling with spotlights, tiled walls and flooring, radiator, range of wall and base units, roll top work surfaces, stainless steel sink with mixer taps, built in hob, oven under and extractor fan above, wall mounted boiler (untested), space for appliances.

Lobby

Self-contained unit on the side with dedicated entrance. Obscure double glazed window to front, obscure double glazed door to front giving a separate access, space for appliances.

Landing

Loft room access.

Bedroom One (3.3m x 3.3m)

Double glazed window to front, coving to ceiling, radiator, carpet flooring, fitted wardrobes.

Bedroom Two (4.2m x 3.3m)

Double glazed window to rear, coving to ceiling, radiator, carpet flooring, fitted wardrobes.

Bedroom Three (2.7m x 2.5m)

Double glazed window to rear, coving to ceiling, radiator, carpet flooring, fitted wardrobes.

Bedroom Four

Large double bedroom in the loft with window to the rear aspect.

Bedroom Five

Large double bedroom in the loft with window to the rear aspect.

Bathroom (2.4m x 1.7m)

Obscure double glazed window to front, vinyl flooring, tiled walls, radiator, suite comprises WC, vanity wash hand basin with mixer taps, panelled bath with mixer taps and hand held shower attachment.

Auctioneers Additional Comments

Pattinson Auction are working in Partnership with the marketing agent on this online auction sale and are referred to below as 'The Auctioneer'.

Please be aware that any enquiry, bid or viewing of the subject property will require your details being shared between both the marketing agent and The Auctioneer in order that all matters can be dealt with effectively.

This auction lot is being sold either under conditional (Modern) or unconditional (Traditional) auction terms and overseen by the auctioneer in partnership with the marketing agent.

The property is available to be viewed strictly by appointment only via the Marketing Agent or The Auctioneer. Bids can be made via The Auctioneers or the Marketing Agents website.

Auctioneers Additional Comments

Your details may be shared with additional service providers via the marketing agent and/or The Auctioneer.

A Legal Pack associated with this particular property is available to view upon request and contains details relevant to the legal documentation enabling all interested parties to make an informed decision prior to bidding. The Legal Pack will also outline the buyers' obligations and sellers' commitments. It is strongly advised that you seek the counsel of a solicitor prior to proceeding with any property and/or Land Title purchase.

In order to submit a bid upon any property being marketed by The Auctioneer, all bidders/buyers will be required to adhere to a verification of identity process in accordance with Anti Money Laundering procedures.

Auctioneers Additional Comments

In order to secure the property and ensure commitment from the seller, upon agreement of sale, the successful bidder will be expected to pay a non-refundable deposit and or reservation fee of up to 6% inc VAT (subject to a minimum of between 2,400 and 6,000 inc VAT dependant on geographical location and contract type) Full terms and conditions are available on The Auctioneers website.

The Reservation Fee is in addition to the agreed purchase price and consideration should be made by the purchaser in relation to any Stamp Duty Land Tax liability associated with overall purchase costs. The Auctioneer may believe it necessary or beneficial to the customer to pass your details to third party service suppliers, from which a referral fee may be obtained. There is no requirement or obligation to use these recommended suppliers or services.

detailedDescription:
Take a look at this stunning one-bedroom apartment which is ideally positioned in the ever desirable Dagenham area of London.

The accommodation on offer comprises of a large lounge/dining room which then also leads to a modern kitchen, the bedroom is a good size double room which is unique, the lovely bathroom can be found just off of the hallway along with good size storage cupboards. Externally there is a secure allocated parking space for one car and plenty of free parking in the surrounding areas

The property is very well presented throughout and will make a great first-time purchase to get you onto the property ladder or even if you're looking for a rental to start or to further build your property portfolio.

While benefiting from its quiet location the property boasts exceptional transport links, to trains and buses, and also you are also able to access the bars, restaurants, and shops on offer making this property an absolute must-see

detailedDescription:
Register with Pocket Living now to book a viewing!
Award-winning developer Pocket Living's latest scheme: Harbard Close IG11. Offering 78 one bedroom affordable Pocket homes for London’s city makers, all with access to an indoor Garden Room where residents can work, exercise & relax. Harbard Close IG11 will also include access to landscaped gardens, allotment spaces and a ping pong table. Register with Pocket Living now to book a virtual viewing.

Own 100% of your property for 20% less!

Pocket homes are discounted by at least 20% to the local market, allowing Pocket owners to own 100% of their home at a discounted price.

Harbard Close IG11 is conveniently located just a short walk from Barking town centre and Barking station, benefitting from great transport links into central London using the overground, the c2c and the underground network.

Barking has numerous green parks in and around the Borough, with Barking Abbey Grounds just a few minutes' walk from Harbard Close IG11. Barking Park is just a 13 minute walk away and includes a splash park that's open in the summer, some sports courts and a waterside café.

You may be eligible for this property if:

- You live or work in London
- You have a household income of no more than £90,000
- You are a first time buyer

Two wheelchair accessible Pocket homes are available for those who require the use of mobility aids.

Priority will also be available for key workers who meet the above eligibility criteria.

Harbard Close IG11 is a car free development.

Help to Buy is not available.

Internal images of Show Home. CGI's are indicative and for illustrative purposes only.

This is an investment opportunity to purchase a HMO in Barking with the potential to generate £32,244 rent pa & gross yield of 5.9%.

Property information

  • HMO licence for up to 7 people in 5 rooms
  • Bedroom 7 comes with ensuite bathroom and a small kitchenette
  • Shower room on the ground floor
  • Family-size bathroom on the first floor
  • Rear garden with access via the conservatory
  • On-street parking with residents permit
  • A new boiler was installed approximately 5 years ago
  • EPC rating D


Rental information

  • Tenants of rooms 4 & 5 will move to rooms 1 & 2 shortly
  • Vendor is looking to redecorate and clean rooms 3,4 & 5 ready for reletting
  • Following this the new rents will be:
    • Room 1 & 2 - £687 pcm ? Tenants in situ since October 2018
    • Room 3 - £450 pcm ? Vacant
    • Room 4 - £500 pcm ? Vacant
    • Room 5 - £500 pcm ? Vacant
    • Room 7 - £550 pcm ? Let since October 2018
    • Total rent when fully let pcm: £2,687
    • Total rent when fully let pa: £32,244



Running costs

The vendor provided us with the following running costs of this property:

  • Gas & electricity: £5,500 pa
  • Council tax: £1,616.87 pa
  • Water bill: £561.60 pa
  • TV licence: £156.74 pa
  • Total cost pa: £7,835.21

Location information

  • Barking Park is a short walk from the property
  • Barking Overground station and the town centre can be reached in less than 20 minutes on foot
  • Upney Underground station on the District Line can be reach in approximately a 15 minute walk

Agents note The information given in these particulars is intended to help you decide whether you wish to view this property and to avoid wasting your time in viewing unsuitable properties. We have tried to make sure that these particulars are accurate, but to a large extent we have to rely on what the seller tells us about the property. We do not check every single piece of information ourselves as the cost of doing so would be prohibitive and we do not wish to unnecessarily add to the cost of moving house. In accordance with the misrepresentation act, we are required to inform both potential vendors and purchasers, that from time to time both vendors and or purchasers, may be known by our staff, by way of previous customers, friends, neighbours, relatives, etc.

Once you find the property you want to buy, you will need to carry out more investigations into the property than it is practical or reasonable for an estate agent to do when preparing sales particulars. For example, we have not carried out any kind of survey of the property to look for structural defects and would advise any homebuyer to obtain a surveyor's report before exchanging contracts. If you do not have your own surveyor, we would be pleased to recommend one. We have not checked whether any equipment in the property (such as central heating) is in working order and would advise homebuyers to check this. You should also instruct a solicitor to investigate all legal matters relating to the property (e.g. Title, planning permission etc., ), as these are specialist matters in which estate agents are not qualified. Your solicitor will also agree with the seller what items (e.g. Carpets, curtains etc., ) will be included in the sale.

Foxwoods Residential is delighted to offer this 2 bedroom apartment in a well maintained building on second floor. Take advantage of two double bedrooms one with an en suite and built in wardrobe, plus plenty of storage space.

Situated close to Barking, Upney, Becontree, Goodmayes station and local amenities.

Ideal for first-time buyers and the buy to let investors looking to take full advantage of the rising demand and prices in the area.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Are you a first-time buyer? Or maybe you're looking for a great buy-to-let investment. If so, then look no further, this property is ideal for you.

Imagine coming home after a long hard day's work to be welcomed by a lengthy entrance hallway leading into a lovely and warm feeling lounge with large windows located on the ground floor of a secure building giving you easy access without having to negotiate any staircases.

Both bedrooms are of excellent sizes with plenty of space for wardrobes, drawers and desks if you've got children who are studying. Not only that but you also have plenty of communal garden space for a safe area for children to play in.

Hepworth Gardens is a quiet residential street surrounded by open spaces and is only a bus route or a short walk to Barking where you will find excellent shopping facilities and great connections to get in and out of central London.

This is a great property in a great location, so get your viewing requests in asap!

Room sizes:

  • Lounge/Diner 14'7 x 11'4 (4.45m x 3.46m)

  • Bedroom 1 11'9 x 11'3 (3.58m x 3.43m)

detailedDescription:
Register with Pocket Living via our website to book a viewing!
Award-winning developer Pocket Living's latest scheme: Harbard Close IG11. Offering 78 one bedroom affordable Pocket homes for London’s city makers, all with access to an indoor Garden Room where residents can work, exercise & relax. Harbard Close IG11 will also include access to landscaped gardens, allotment spaces and a ping pong table. Register with Pocket Living now to book a virtual viewing.

Own 100% of your property for 20% less!

Pocket homes are discounted by at least 20% to the local market, allowing Pocket owners to own 100% of their home at a discounted price.

Harbard Close IG11 is conveniently located just a short walk from Barking town centre and Barking station, benefitting from great transport links into central London using the overground, the c2c and the underground network.

Barking has numerous green parks in and around the Borough, with Barking Abbey Grounds just a few minutes' walk from Harbard Close IG11. Barking Park is just a 13 minute walk away and includes a splash park that's open in the summer, some sports courts and a waterside café.

You may be eligible for this property if:

- You live or work in London
- You have a household income of no more than £90,000
- You are a first time buyer

Two wheelchair accessible Pocket homes are available for those who require the use of mobility aids.

Priority will also be available for key workers who meet the above eligibility criteria.

Harbard Close IG11 is a car free development.

Internal images of Show Home. CGI's are indicative and for illustrative purposes only.

Summary
for sale by modern auction - two bedroom top floor flat situated close to Upney Station, Bus Routes and Local Amenities. This spacious property features two double bedrooms, bathroom and a large open plan fully fitted kitchen and living room. Property also comes with an allocated parking space.

Description

Auctioneer's Comments
This property is offered through Modern Method of Auction. Should you view, offer or bid your data will be shared with the Auctioneer, iamsold Limited. This method requires both parties to complete the transaction within 56 days, allowing buyers to proceed with mortgage finance (subject to lending criteria, affordability and survey).

The buyer is required to sign a reservation agreement and make payment of a non-refundable Reservation Fee of 4.2% of the purchase price including VAT, subject to a minimum of £6,000.00 including VAT. This fee is paid in addition to purchase price and will be considered as part of the chargeable consideration for the property in the calculation for stamp duty liability. Buyers will be required to complete an identification process with iamsold and provide proof of how the purchase would be funded.

The property has a Buyer Information Pack containing documents about the property. The documents may not tell you everything you need to know, so you must complete your own due diligence before bidding. A sample of the Reservation Agreement and terms and conditions are contained within this pack. The buyer will also make payment of £300 inc VAT towards the preparation cost of the pack.

The estate agent and auctioneer may recommend the services of other providers to you, in which they will be paid for the referral. These services are optional, and you will be advised of any payment, in writing before any services are accepted. Listing is subject to a start price and undisclosed reserve price that can change.

title: 2 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
A rear opportunity to acquire this bright, airy and spacious 2 bedroom first floor flat located on fantastic turning close to Barking Town and Station.

The property is being offer chain free!

The accommodation is accessed via a secure entry system. Stairs to the first floor landing and through the front door leads you into the hallway which provides access throughout the property. To the front you have two double bedrooms and a family bathroom suite. To rear is a bright and spacious open plan kitchen dining area. The property also benefits with storage cupboards, double glazed windows and gas central heating.

A key feature includes the property benefitting with an allocated parking slot which can be accessed via a secure electric gate. There are also communal outdoor spaces for the kids to enjoy themselves.

The lease is well over 100 years however the landlord is due to confirm if it has a leave above 950 years remaining.

Service Charge & Ground Rent equates to circa £1850 pa

Location

The location is very unique - Situated on the highly developed Abbey Road, Barking Station is roughly a 10 minute walk away providing easy access in to Central London via the District, Hammersmith & City plus Circle Line. Buses and local amenities can be found down the road and for those who commute via car the A13, A406 and M11 Roads are also nearby. Furthermore, local School, parks, amenities and supermarkets are also situated locally making this property ideal for both residential and investment purpose.

Book in a viewing today to avoid missing out!

detailedDescription:
Register with Pocket Living now to book a viewing!
Award-winning developer Pocket Living's latest scheme: Harbard Close IG11. Offering 78 one bedroom affordable Pocket homes for London’s city makers, all with access to an indoor Garden Room where residents can work, exercise & relax. Harbard Close IG11 will also include access to landscaped gardens, allotment spaces and a ping pong table. Register with Pocket Living now to book a virtual viewing.

Own 100% of your property for 20% less!

Pocket homes are discounted by at least 20% to the local market, allowing Pocket owners to own 100% of their home at a discounted price.

Harbard Close IG11 is conveniently located just a short walk from Barking town centre and Barking station, benefitting from great transport links into central London using the overground, the c2c and the underground network.

Barking has numerous green parks in and around the Borough, with Barking Abbey Grounds just a few minutes' walk from Harbard Close IG11. Barking Park is just a 13 minute walk away and includes a splash park that's open in the summer, some sports courts and a waterside café.

You may be eligible for this property if:

- You live or work in London
- You have a household income of no more than £90,000
- You are a first time buyer

Two wheelchair accessible Pocket homes are available for those who require the use of mobility aids.

Priority will also be available for key workers who meet the above eligibility criteria.

Harbard Close IG11 is a car free development.

Help to Buy isn't available.

This apartment is located on the award winning Barking Rioverside development. Minutes away, the EL1 and EL2 links you directly to Dagenham Dock and Barking station. As part of the areas redevelopment, Barking Riverside Station is due to open in 2021. Just a 7 minute walk from home this London Overground extension will make it easier for residents to reach the City, as well as other major tube lines, including the Hammersmith & City line.

Greatfields Park is just ten minutes by car, offering over 5 hectares of open space and a number of sports opportunities. The National Trust’s Eastbury Manor House offers tranquil gardens to explore with a striking backdrop, just eleven minutes by car. Ripple Nature Reserve, just a five minute drive, has over 10 hectares of woodland and grassland areas to explore, which provide habitats for various wildlife. Closer to home, this riverside location has a pedestrian footpath for refreshing strolls along the river.

The buyer will require a deposit to obtain a mortgage for this property.

title: 2 bed maisonette for sale

detailedDescription:
Summary

For Sale By Online Auction. Starting Bid 180,000. Terms and conditions apply.

We welcome to the market this two bedroom apartment situated on a high floor with a large private balcony, two bathrooms, two good sized bedrooms and large open plan kitchen/reception. 6.5% rental yield.

Bath house is located within walking distance of many local shops and transport links. Barking station sits just 5 minutes from your from doorstep whilst the High street hosts an abundance of shops, restaurants and supermarkets.

This apartment sits on just over 650 sq ft of living space. As you enter into your large hallway and past your storage cupboard to the left you will find your first family bathroom on the right-hand side. A bath/shower welcome you in here. Back into the hallway and to the left is your large living area.

Well designed to play host to both a kitchen/dining area along with a large open reception room. Your kitchen comes fully equipped with extractor fan, oven, fridge/freezer, washing machine and dishwasher. Just off this room is your large full length private balcony.

Back into the hallway and just to the left is where you will find your 1st double bedroom, spacious in size and perfect as a spare room or childrens room. To finish off is your master room, fantastic size whilst including built in wardrobes and a luxurious en-suite bathroom.

Auctioneers Additional Comments

Pattinson Auction are working in Partnership with the marketing agent on this online auction sale and are referred to below as 'The Auctioneer'.

Please be aware that any enquiry, bid or viewing of the subject property will require your details being shared between both the marketing agent and The Auctioneer in order that all matters can be dealt with effectively.

This auction lot is being sold either under conditional (Modern) or unconditional (Traditional) auction terms and overseen by the auctioneer in partnership with the marketing agent.

The property is available to be viewed strictly by appointment only via the Marketing Agent or The Auctioneer. Bids can be made via The Auctioneers or the Marketing Agents website.

Auctioneers Additional Comments

Your details may be shared with additional service providers via the marketing agent and/or The Auctioneer.

A Legal Pack associated with this particular property is available to view upon request and contains details relevant to the legal documentation enabling all interested parties to make an informed decision prior to bidding. The Legal Pack will also outline the buyers' obligations and sellers' commitments. It is strongly advised that you seek the counsel of a solicitor prior to proceeding with any property and/or Land Title purchase.

In order to submit a bid upon any property being marketed by The Auctioneer, all bidders/buyers will be required to adhere to a verification of identity process in accordance with Anti Money Laundering procedures.

Auctioneers Additional Comments

In order to secure the property and ensure commitment from the seller, upon agreement of sale, the successful bidder will be expected to pay a non-refundable deposit and or reservation fee of up to 6% inc VAT (subject to a minimum of between 2,400 and 6,000 inc VAT dependant on geographical location and contract type) Full terms and conditions are available on The Auctioneers website.

The Reservation Fee is in addition to the agreed purchase price and consideration should be made by the purchaser in relation to any Stamp Duty Land Tax liability associated with overall purchase costs. The Auctioneer may believe it necessary or beneficial to the customer to pass your details to third party service suppliers, from which a referral fee may be obtained. There is no requirement or obligation to use these recommended suppliers or services.

address: Exeter House, 41 Academy Way, Dagenham RM8
detailedDescription:
Docklands Prestige Residential are delighted to present a Three bedroom, Two Bathroom property in the sought after development - Academy Central. The Master Bedroom features En-Suite Bathroom and the property has been finished to a high standard throughout.

The property is located on the sixth floor and benefits from a Large Private Balcony and further benefits from it's own dedicated Parking Bay.

Academy Central is superbly placed for shopping, leisure and travel. Locally Vicarage Field, in the heart of Barking town centre, offers well over fifty shops in a modern setting with high street names and local independent stores. Situated 10 minutes walk away from Goodmayes rail station there are great links available to get you into central London in under 30 minutes.

Nearby Ilford offers a Sainsburys, plus the popular Exchange Mall, with its impressive food hall and more than a hundred shops, from M&S to Debenhams. Ilford is also where you will find two national health and fitness club chains.

Lease Term: 116 years approx.
Ground rent: 300 Per Year approx.
Service Charge £1,800 Per Year approx.
