title: 2 bed end terrace house for sale

detailedDescription:
Register with Pocket Living now to book a viewing!
Award-winning developer Pocket Living's latest scheme: Harbard Close IG11. Offering 78 one bedroom affordable Pocket homes for London’s city makers, all with access to an indoor Garden Room where residents can work, exercise & relax. Harbard Close IG11 will also include access to landscaped gardens, allotment spaces and a ping pong table. Register with Pocket Living now to book a virtual viewing.

Own 100% of your property for 20% less!

Pocket homes are discounted by at least 20% to the local market, allowing Pocket owners to own 100% of their home at a discounted price.

Harbard Close IG11 is conveniently located just a short walk from Barking town centre and Barking station, benefitting from great transport links into central London using the overground, the c2c and the underground network.

Barking has numerous green parks in and around the Borough, with Barking Abbey Grounds just a few minutes' walk from Harbard Close IG11. Barking Park is just a 13 minute walk away and includes a splash park that's open in the summer, some sports courts and a waterside café.

You may be eligible for this property if:

- You live or work in London
- You have a household income of no more than £90,000
- You are a first time buyer

Two wheelchair accessible Pocket homes are available for those who require the use of mobility aids.

Priority will also be available for key workers who meet the above eligibility criteria.

Harbard Close IG11 is a car free development.

Help to Buy is not available.

Internal images of Show Home. CGI's are indicative and for illustrative purposes only.

Beautiful Family Home!

Located within close proximity to Barking station and within walking distance of local amenities is this stunning two bedroom mid terraced house. The property which is in good condition boasts of a bright and spacious through lounge, modern fitted kitchen and a ground floor bath room, to the first floor there are two well proportioned double bedrooms. Externally there is a rear garden which is easily maintained and a nice outside space for children to play, with the benefit of artificial grass there is no need for a lawn mower, just enjoy the space.

The location of the property is perfect for transport links and there are buses running from just around the corner that go to Barking Barking station you can catch a train on the District, Hammersmith and City and also C2C. Road links are excellent with the A406, A13 and M11 all only short rides away.

Close by the house there are some local convenience stores all within walking distance, slightly further away is Barking Town Centre where you can find all the big high street brands and the Vicarage fields shopping centre as well as Asda and Lidl, there is also Tesco and Sainsbury’s just along the A13 at Beckton and here you can also visit Galleons Reach retail park where again, all the big brand clothing and retail shops can be found.

When buying a family home schooling is obviously an important factor and there are both Primary and Secondary schools close by, mostly with good and excellent Ofsted ratings.

This great home could soon be yours, so pick up the phone and call to book your viewing now!

detailedDescription:
For Sale By Online Auction. Starting Bids from £180,000. Terms and Conditions Apply. Cash buyers only. Auction date 5th May 2021. A fantastic opportunity for small families or investors. 2 bedroom apartment situated on a high floor with a large private balcony, 2 bathrooms, 2 good sized bedrooms and large open plan kitchen/reception. 6.5% rental yield.

Bath house is located within walking distance of many local shops and transport links. Barking station sits just 5 minutes from your from doorstep whilst the Highstreet hosts an abundance of shops, restaurants and supermarkets.

This apartment sits on just over 670 sq ft of living space. As you enter into your large hallway and past your storage cupboard to the left you will find your first family bathroom on the right-hand side. A bath/shower welcome you in here. Back into the hallway and to the left is your large living area.

Well designed to play host to both a kitchen/dining area along with a large open reception room. Your kitchen comes fully equipped with extractor fan, oven, fridge/freezer, washing machine and dishwasher. Just off this room is your large full length private balcony.

Back into the hallway and just to the left is where you will find your 1st double bedroom, spacious in size and perfect as a spare room or childrens room. To finish off is your master room, fantastic size whilst including built in wardrobes and a luxurious en-suite bathroom.

Auctioneers Additional Comments
Pattinson Auction are working in Partnership with the marketing agent on this online auction sale and are referred to below as 'The Auctioneer'.

Please be aware that any enquiry, bid or viewing of the subject property will require your details being shared between both the marketing agent and The Auctioneer in order that all matters can be dealt with effectively.

This auction lot is being sold either under conditional (Modern) or unconditional (Traditional) auction terms and overseen by the auctioneer in partnership with the marketing agent.

The property is available to be viewed strictly by appointment only via the Marketing Agent or The Auctioneer. Bids can be made via The Auctioneers or the Marketing Agents website.

Auctioneers Additional Comments
Your details may be shared with additional service providers via the marketing agent and/or The Auctioneer.

A Legal Pack associated with this particular property is available to view upon request and contains details relevant to the legal documentation enabling all interested parties to make an informed decision prior to bidding. The Legal Pack will also outline the buyers' obligations and sellers' commitments. It is strongly advised that you seek the counsel of a solicitor prior to proceeding with any property and/or Land Title purchase.

In order to submit a bid upon any property being marketed by The Auctioneer, all bidders/buyers will be required to adhere to a verification of identity process in accordance with Anti Money Laundering procedures.

Auctioneers Additional Comments
In order to secure the property and ensure commitment from the seller, upon exchange of contracts the successful bidder will be expected to pay a non-refundable deposit of 5% of the purchase price of the property. The deposit will be a contribution to the purchase price. A non-refundable reservation fee of up to 6% inc VAT (subject to a minimum of 6,000 inc VAT) is also required to be paid upon agreement of sale. The Reservation Fee is in addition to the agreed purchase price and consideration should be made by the purchaser in relation to any Stamp Duty Land Tax liability associated with overall purchase costs.

Both the Marketing Agent and The Auctioneer may believe necessary or beneficial to the customer to pass your details to third party service suppliers, from which a referral fee may be obtained. There is no requirement or indeed obligation to use these recommended suppliers or services.

detailedDescription:
Docklands Prestige Residential proudly present this modern Two Bedroom Apartment in highly sought after Barking Academy. This is a fantastic development offering peaceful residential living at its finest.

The property features fitted kitchen units, integrated appliances and a high quality finish throughout.

Created by Taylor Wimpey in partnership with L&Q group, this contemporary new development offers an amazing standard of living. Located off Longbridge Road, fronting Lodge Avenue on one of its borders, and Mayesbrook Park at another, Academy Central is superbly placed for shopping, leisure and travel. Locally Vicarage Field, in the heart of Barking town centre, offers well over fifty shops in a modern setting with high street names and local independent stores.

In addition to an Asda superstore in Barking, nearby Ilford offers a Sainsburys, plus the popular Exchange Mall, with its impressive food hall and more than a hundred shops, from M&S to Debenhams. Ilford is also where you will find two national health and fitness club chains.

For sale by modern auction - T & C s apply

This is modern ground floor flat located close to the centre of Barking, located close to local amenities and shopping facilities. The property is ideal for a first time buyer, or a property investor as it has so much potential, and has its own parking space.

Room sizes:
  • Lounge/Diner 15'8 x 9'6 (4.78m x 2.90m)

  • Bedroom 1 12'7 x 9'1 (3.84m x 2.77m)
  • Bathroom
  • Car parking space


Please note that this property is for sale by the Modern Method of Auction which is not to be confused with Traditional auction. The Modern Method of Auction is a flexible buyer-friendly method of purchase. We do not require the buyer to exchange contracts immediately, but grant 28 days to achieve exchange of contracts from the date the buyer's solicitor is in receipt of the draft contracts and a further 28 days thereafter to complete. Allowing the additional time to exchange on the property means interested parties can proceed with traditional residential finance. Upon close of a successful auction or if the vendor accepts an offer during the auction, the buyer will be required to put down a non-refundable Reservation Fee of 3.6% (inclusive of VAT) subject to a minimum of £6,000 (inclusive of VAT) which secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. The buyer will be required to sign an Acknowledgment of Reservation form to confirm acceptance of terms prior to solicitors being instructed. Copies of the Reservation form and all terms and conditions can be found in the Legal Pack which can be downloaded for free from the auction section of our website or requested from our Auction Department.

Please note this property is subject to an undisclosed Reserve Price which is generally no more than 10% in excess of the Starting Bid. Both the Starting Bid and Reserve Price can be subject to change. Our primary duty of care is to the vendor. Terms and conditions apply to the Modern Method of Auction, which is operated by Douglas Allen powered by iam-sold Ltd.

The information provided about this property does not constitute or form part of an offer or contract, nor may be it be regarded as representations. All interested parties must verify accuracy and your solicitor must verify tenure/lease information, fixtures & fittings and, where the property has been extended/converted, planning/building regulation consents. All dimensions are approximate and quoted for guidance only as are floor plans which are not to scale and their accuracy cannot be confirmed. Reference to appliances and/or services does not imply that they are necessarily in working order or fit for the purpose.

We are pleased to offer our customers a range of additional services to help them with moving home. None of these services are obligatory and you are free to use service providers of your choice. Current regulations require all estate agents to inform their customers of the fees they earn for recommending third party services. If you choose to use a service provider recommended by Douglas Allen, details of all referral fees can be found at the link below. If you decide to use any of our services, please be assured that this will not increase the fees you pay to our service providers, which remain as quoted directly to you.

This property is available to buy outright or on a shared ownership basis

Agents Comments

This will make an ideal first purchase with its lovely riverside location and equally a great buy to let opportunity with a current rental value estimated at £1100.00 per month. The property is also being sold with the added bonus of no onward chain so a quick move is available

Location

A chic riverside apartment located under 1 mile from Barking town centre and mainline/underground station giving excellent access to the City. Barking town centre also has a large shopping mall and open market . It is also only minutes from the A13 giving direct access into central London and the M25

There is also a modern completely separate kitchen with integrated appliances including oven and hob, fridge freezer and washing machine. There is also a good sized double bedroom with the opportunity of free standing furnishings dependant on price agreed.

As you would expect in a modern apartment there is gas central heating, double glazing and modern insulation standards which have resulted in very good energy-efficiency and environmental-impact ratings.

The building has a gated underground car park which includes an allocated space for this apartment. For the commuter Barking town centre and railway station are within comfortable walking distance or a brief bus/cycle ride. detailedDescription:
A fantastic opportunity to acquire this 3 bedroom 1 reception end of terrace house located in a quite cul-de-sac residential location with further potential to extend STPP.

The accommodation is accessed via your newly fitted porch leading into the hallway. On the ground floor you have a a large reception with dining space, a spacious kitchen to the front and an ground floor cloakroom. To the first floor you have a good sized landing with the master bedroom to the front along with a double and single sized rooms to the rear. The family bathroom is also situated on the first floor.

A special key feature includes the property having a garage to the side with off street parking and also scope for double storey side and rear extension STPP. The rear garden is larger than average and boast plenty of sunlight. The property also benefits with gas central heating, double glazed windows.

The front of the property has a beautifully presented front garden and a larger than average rear garden mainly laid to lawn making it ideal for children and those summer BBQs.

Location

The location is very unique - Situated in the Barking Riverside Estate, the A13, A406 and the M11 roads are within comfortable distance. There is a large amount of development taking place near by with new train lines and retail parks being open very soon. Local bus services are within walking distance providing easy access towards Barking & Ilford Town centres. Barking and Upney Stations are also within comfortable distance. The area is full of parks and local amenities just round the corner making it an ideal property for those with kids, first time buyers or an investor.

Book in a viewing today to avoid missing out!

detailedDescription:
Final 2 bedroom apartment for £76,250 with Shared Ownership! A 5th floor floor, modern 2 bedroom apartment offers a stylish kitchen and open-plan living area, walking distance to Barking station, just 15 minutes from London Fenchurch Street

L&q's Weavers Quarter set within central Barking has released its last and final phase of two-bedroom apartments. This new development is a joint venture with the London Borough of Barking and Dagenham.

Your new home
With a name inspired by the Jute mills that once flourished in this area, Weavers Quarter is set to become part of an exciting, vibrant neighbourhood.
The London Borough of Barking & Dagenham has been transforming the area into a thriving new community with two new schools, in addition to this, a multi-million-pound regeneration scheme is underway in Barking town centre, with independent cafes, bars and shops popping up moments from Weavers Quarter.
The contemporary, high-quality homes are sleek, modern and aspirational. There's certainly plenty of choice, plus numerous property layouts. All are designed with singles, couples and young families in mind.

Connectivity
Barking station is less than 1/2 a mile away from where you can reach London Fenchurch Street in under 15 minutes and Liverpool Street in just 22 minutes. You can also access District and Hammersmith & City lines. The A13 and North Circular road are on hand providing links with Canary Wharf, London City Airport. There is excellent bus route network connecting all areas of London.

Description

ReMax Star delighted to offer for sale this three bedroom end of the terraced home which is ideally situated for local shops, schools, East-brook end Country Park and the popular Central Park hosting a variety of family events throughout the year. Dagenham East District Line station is also located within just a one-mile walking distance.

The property itself has lots to offer with two reception rooms, an l-Shaped kitchen, a ground floor shower room, a first-floor family bathroom, and a rear garden of approximately 60x50. Further benefits include double glazing and gas central heating throughout.

In our opinion this would be an ideal purchase for any young or growing family and internal viewing is strongly advised to appreciate the accommodation on offer.

detailedDescription:
***move straight in*** Attractive and superbly presented, we are delighted to offer this spacious two double bedroom, split level purpose built flat having recently undergone a well throughout out refurbishment to create a fabulous family home in this up and coming location of Barking Riverside. The property offers two double bedrooms, walk in shower room, separate WC, lovely lounge, fitted kitchen with a contemporary interior finish perfect for a family to enjoy for many years. The property offers the additional benefits of a conservatory area, private rear garden and the luxury of off street parking.

The property is situated close to frequent bus services that take you into Barking Town Centre and Barking underground tube station. Across the road you will find the open green space for the kids to enjoy with a play area. The Barking Riverside station is under construction which will be a short walk away from the property and the area is undergoing major redevelopment and demand for properties in the area is rising so get in quick and book your appointment.
